caller_intent: Deborah wants to adjust her insurance deductible and reinstate a mortgage discount by contacting Auto Owners to release the policy, while ensuring her auto insurance remains separate from her home policy.
resolution_steps: Agent Heather acknowledges Deborah's request to adjust deductible and reinstate mortgage discount.
Heather confirms need to contact Auto Owners to undo cancellation and release the policy for changes.
Deborah agrees to wait for Heather's callback after policy release to finalize deductible and discount adjustments.
knowledge_required: Understanding of insurance policy adjustments (deductibles, mortgage discounts)
Process for contacting Auto Owners to release policies
Knowledge of separate auto/home insurance discounts
summary: Deborah discusses adjusting her home insurance deductible and reinstating a mortgage discount with agent Heather. Heather explains the need to contact Auto Owners to release the policy before changes can be made. Deborah agrees to wait for a callback after policy release to finalize adjustments, while confirming her auto insurance can remain separate.
